name: to-do app
description: full-stack app that allows a user to insert and delete tasks.

name: tv show picker
description: front-end app that fetches tv show data from an API. User can navigate between shows with a dropdown and filter shows and episodes using a search bar

name: baby names picker
description: front-end app that can be used to choose baby names

name: perlin noise - clouds
description: perlin noise experiment using p5.js. Emulates moving clouds.

name: promises and async await
description: presentation on the use of promises and the async and await keywords in JavaScript.

name: recursion
description: presentation on the use of recursion.

name: eisenhower matrix
description: This app will have an Eisenhower matrix background and the ability to add task notes. The task notes will be draggable so that they can be positioned in the correct quadrant easily.

name: flow field experiments
description: Experiments with perlin noise and flow fields to create images that resemble synthetic materials.

name: dog breed voting
description: Vote on the cutest dog breed from two randomly selected from Dog Breed API.
